message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within a certain budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $120 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $170?
I understand your perspective, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider $140? I'm really interested in the product and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
